product_name: MaybellineSuper Stay Up to 24HR Hybrid Powder-Foundation
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsGive BackGet the ultimate medium-to-full coverage, soft-matte look with Maybelline New York's Super Stay Up to 24HR Hybrid Powder-Foundation. This super powder with hybrid technology has the performance of a liquid with the comfort of a powder. It lasts up to 24 hours and resists sweat, water, and transfer.
details: DetailsBenefitsMedium-to-full coverageSoft-matte finish with a weightless feelNon-comedogenic & suitable for all skin typesItem 2603936How To UseApply to skin and blend. Use the included sponge applicator for more full coverage or a brush for a more natural finish.IngredientsTalc, Dimethicone, Zinc Stearate, Silica, Zea Mays Starch/Corn Starch, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Potassium Sorbate, Silica (Nano)/Silica, Isoceteth-10, Barium Sulfate, Tocopherol. May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Ci 77891/Titanium Dioxide, Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499/Iron Oxides, Ci 19140/Yellow 5 Lake, Mica, Ci 77742/Manganese Violet, Ci 15850/Red 7 Lake.
how_to_use: Apply to skin and blend. Use the included sponge applicator for more full coverage or a brush for a more natural finish.
ingredients: Tocopherol. May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Ci 77891/Titanium Dioxide

reviews.headline: My only foundation
reviews.comments: I have tried way too many cream, liquid, and powder foundations and keep going back to this one. I have been using for years. Even good for mature skin.

12+ hours of coverage, that will hold up in humid summer Weather, this is my tried & true. Matte. Buildable formula, versatile, light handed with a fluffy brush or pack on with puff for more coverage. On  "dry" days, mist with a hydrating spray.

reviews.headline: Coverage is not there
reviews.comments: I was looking for something to replace my beloved elf camo powder foundation after they discontinued it but this one is not it. The coverage is nonexistent, and texture is just chalky. Wish i could return but sadly tried too long to make it work and missed the return window.

reviews.headline: just no
reviews.comments: not a good product for those with large pores or any texture. also wears off so quick

reviews.headline: More than a powder!
reviews.comments: Like the name implies, this is definitely more than just a powder. I can wear it over a good primer instead of foundation and setting powder on some days. The finish is amazing!  The color selection is very good and this is great for touch ups at work or out and about. I keep one in my desk at work as well as my purse, love it!!!!

reviews.headline: reliable powder
reviews.comments: I have used this on and off and find it is a good reliable powder that always has a smooth and matte finish and wears well. I find the formula very matte, so it can be dry. Affordable and accessible. I would recommend to those with normal to oily skin.

reviews.headline: Good for summer
reviews.comments: Gets the job done in summer when it's hotter and more humid. Applies easily with a foundation brush, doesn't get cakey or dry. No need to blend since it's a powder. Powder blush goes over it and blends easily. I also like how quickly and cleanly this applies, vs. liquid products.

reviews.headline: We're only bringing clean makeup with us in 2025
reviews.comments: This product contains silica which can damage DNA and the nano particles can help your skin asorb the harmful ingredients of the other trash makeup you're buying!

reviews.headline: Best One There Is
reviews.comments: The best powder foundation ive found and ive tried many. Here's a list of ones ive tried and i still like this better than: Make Up For Ever blurring powder foundation, Bareminerals original loose powder mineral foundation, Jane Iredale loose powder foundation, Jane Iredale pressed powder foundation, Tarte Amazonian Clay loose powder foundation. So yeah — ive tried A LOT. Everytime i come back to this one, i question why i keep trying to find something better. Make sure to first prep your skin with a good moisturizer and primer before applying. Let both fully absorb and dry before applying a powder foundation. This is simply the best ive found and each time i wear it, i get told how good my skin looks and even most recently, how i look like im still in my 20s lol. Im way past 20s.

reviews.headline: Great Powder Foundation
reviews.comments: I purchased the Maybelline Super Stay Up To 24 Hour Hyrbid Powder Foundation in shade 118 as an alternative to a luxury brand I typically use. This powder foundation not only covers better than the luxury brand, it looks and performs better, for a third of the price! The shade is also a perfect match for my fair but olive skintone, not to pink or yellow, just right. I am 37 with dry skin and this still works for me. It does not settle into fine lines, crease, cake up, or become shiny throughout the day. I wear it to work every day and am considering it as my wedding foundation for later this year! I apply it with a brush when I want less coverage and with the accompanying sponge when I want more coverage. It lasts all day and does not transfer. I typically use a setting spray afterwards but even when I forget it still lasts and looks good. I just cant say enough good things about this product!

reviews.headline: pretty good!
reviews.comments: definitely minimal coverage but works great for a no makeup-makeup day.

reviews.headline: Great coverage but breaks into pieces
reviews.comments: This was my go to daily wear foundation. Great colors and nice light coverage. However, almost immediately cracks form in the pan and big chunks fall out of the compact and the little dust particles that are left are pretty much rendered useless. It's unfortunate because the product could be very good.

reviews.headline: This is my Ride or Die foundation
reviews.comments: First off, Shade 112 is absolute perfection for me. This has such incredible coverage that only a small amount is required to help make your skin look so pretty! It can be built up to absolute full coverage but, in my opinion, that can look a bit cakey and too artificial. I use a flat top brush to apply this mostly to my nose and cheeks where I've got the most redness then pull it outward and I'm never not satisfied with the coverage. I've gotten a darker shade to wear as bronzer just because it covers so well!

reviews.headline: Easy to Apply; Stays in Place
reviews.comments: Nice texture and goes on easy. Wish I had bought a slightly darker shade.

reviews.headline: Quick application
reviews.comments: This powder foundation is quick and easy to apply. The only issue I have with it is that it tends to cake up under the eye area if you have wrinkles there. Otherwise it's perfect for smooth and young skin.

reviews.headline: Best with Maybelline 30hr Super Stay Foundation
reviews.comments: This is awesome alone or applied with big brush over Maybelline 30hr Super Stay foundation!

reviews.headline: Not for me!
reviews.comments: Looks very dry and cakes. will only use very lightly. I have dry skin and this looks very dry and cakey.

reviews.headline: I dislike this New Formula
reviews.comments: Ive used this product for years. This new formula is super loose messy red tones & transfers . Sad I have to find another powder.

reviews.headline: Face powder
reviews.comments: Very nice I would definitely buy again

reviews.headline: No, I did not like this product
reviews.comments: It was not the right color and as I allowed it to wear more to see if it would maybe look better in the sunlight it was still bad. It Was a little cake for my liking…. Today is July 9. I'm returning it tomorrow when I get off of work. I Gave it a weeks try and nothing good for me. I bought it on June 25.

faceoff_positive.comments: I LOVE this product. I apply it over my regular foundation and just in certain areas like my cheeks and forehead with the provided applicator and lightly with a brush in the areas that my skin is more "mature". I've gotten so many compliments on my skin and I'm 51. I think the low reviews might often be people applying it incorrectly. My only issue is that it's brittle as you can see in the picture. I just realized today that I can press it back in somewhat. I just cannot take it anywhere because it is messy. I will buy again though. Thank you, again, Maybelline for another great product at an affordable price!!
faceoff_positive.headline: I get compliments on my skin

faceoff_negative.comments: For a company this established with as much money as it has, you'd think that in the year of 2023 they'd be able to make a foundation for all skin tones. Their "darkest shade" is simply unacceptable given that many brands have twice the range on their initial launches. Their unwillingness to include darker ranges at this point is a blatant statement that they don't care about dark skin. They can absolutely afford to do better, they're just choosing not to.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not an inclusive range

rollup.name: Super Stay Up to 24HR Hybrid Powder-Foundation
